context: Tests whether the agent correctly applies the skill's error handling matrix (transcript/slides success/fail to specific status values), slide source determination logic, skip-for-missing-sources rules, and additive summary update policy.

checklist.name: Full success status
checklist.description: Talks where both transcript and slides succeeded (Microservices Myths, Platform Engineering) get status 'processed' (not 'complete', 'done', or 'success')

checklist.name: Partial transcript fail
checklist.description: Talks where transcript failed but slides succeeded (Security Shift Left) get status 'processed_partial' (not 'partial', 'incomplete', or 'failed')

checklist.name: Partial slides fail
checklist.description: Talks where transcript succeeded but slides failed (DevOps Culture Reset) get status 'processed_partial'

checklist.name: Both fail status
checklist.description: Talks where both transcript and slides failed (GitOps Journey) get status 'skipped_download_failed' (not 'failed', 'error', or 'skipped')

checklist.name: Missing sources skip
checklist.description: Container Security Deep Dive (no video_url, no slides_url, no pptx_path) is marked 'skipped_no_sources' — not 'pending' or 'failed'

checklist.name: No video skip
checklist.description: Testing in Production (has slides_url but no video_url) is identified as not processable due to missing video — marked as skipped, not processed

checklist.name: Slide source pptx
checklist.description: Platform Engineering (has pptx_path but no slides_url) gets slide_source set to 'pptx'

checklist.name: Slide source both
checklist.description: Talks with both slides_url and pptx_path (Microservices Myths, GitOps Journey) get slide_source set to 'both'

checklist.name: Slide source pdf
checklist.description: Talks with only slides_url and no pptx_path (DevOps Culture, Security Shift Left) get slide_source set to 'pdf'

checklist.name: Summary additive only
checklist.description: The updated rhetoric summary preserves ALL existing content from the original (Section 1, 2, 4, 7, 15 text is still present) — nothing was deleted or replaced

checklist.name: Summary has new content
checklist.description: The updated rhetoric summary adds new observations from the successfully processed talks (at least one new pattern or refinement added)
